alert.note: Alert for Benton; Mille Lacs; Morrison; Sherburne; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 2:57PM CST until February 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches. Locally higher amounts are likely, particularly in northern counties. * WHERE...Morrison, Mille Lacs, Benton, Sherburne and Wright Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will make for difficult travel. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Mille Lacs; Morrison; Sherburne; Wright
